text: The 2012 Summer Olympics medal table is a list of the medals won by athletes in the 2012 Summer Olympics in London. == Medal table == ;Key Changes in medal standings (see below) ==References== ==Other websites== * London 2012 – Official website * London 2012 Olympics – Official Medal Standings *London 2012 Olympics – Interactive Medal Standings (by country, sport, event, medal & athlete) from “The Hive Group” Medal table Category:London-related lists
title: 2012 Summer Olympics medal table
